description: The image features a dynamic and eye-catching design for a Black Friday and Cyber Monday advertisement. Bold, large text dominates the center, emphasizing the spectacular 70% discount, making it the focal point to grab attention. The background is a mix of dark colors, like black and deep red, representing the urgency and excitement of these shopping events. Elements like shopping bags, discount tags, and stars are scattered throughout the design, enhancing the festive shopping atmosphere.
